about_the_game:
Get ready to be charmed and challenged in Swamped !, a tower defense adventure where cuteness meets strategy!




Choose from a wide array of quirky towers, each with unique abilities. Strategically place them along the path to unleash adorable chaos on your foes!





Discover rare items, powerful artifacts, and enchanting hats that will make your heroes unstoppable.
Improve Your Character: Gain experience and level up your heroes to unlock new skills and abilities. Watch them evolve from scrappy recruits to legendary defenders.





Journey through lush forests, whimsical meadows, and mysterious caves as you face a variety of adorable foes. Each level presents new challenges and rewards, so gather your wits and your cutest defenders to conquer them all!

key Features:


  • Adorable visuals: Immerse yourself in a world overflowing with charm and cuteness.
  • Strategic tower defense gameplay: Plan your defenses carefully to outsmart your enemies.
  • RPG progression: Level up your heroes, unlock skills, and equip them with powerful gear.
  • Tons of loot: Discover rare items, funny hats, and magical equipment to customize your character.
  • Whether you're a seasoned tower defense veteran or a newcomer to the genre, Swamped will captivate you with its delightful world, strategic challenges, and heartwarming characters. Are you ready to defend the cutest realm ever known?

Join the fun and start your Swamped adventure today!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500

name: Swamped!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: Discover a Tower Defense as cute as it is addictive. Collect funny hats, magical equipment, and special powers to create the ultimate defense build. Explore an enchanted world filled with charming characters and challenges to overcome!
